title: New: Taneli – Positivity
body:
I’ve had this track on repeat for pretty much an hour now, so it only seemed fitting that I wrote something about it.

Hailing from Preston, [**Taneli**](http://www.facebook.com/uktaneli?sk=wall) is an 18 year old Music Production student, and _Positivity_ appears to be his debut track, as such. It’s soulful and danceable in a way that would make **Star Slinger** jealous and certainly an extremely exciting first outing from the young producer. The garage influences are fairly prominently, alongside the dubstep orientated backing beat, however it’s the hip-hop vibes on _Positivity_ that really intrigue me. If only he’d put it up for free download. Check it out below.

 [Positivity (Original Mix)](http://soundcloud.com/uktaneli/positivity-192-kbps) by [Taneli.](http://soundcloud.com/uktaneli)
